sections.text:
History:Laws 2005, ch. 104, § 11; 2011, ch. 67, § 1.

Repeals.— Laws 2015 (1st S.S.), ch. 2, § 24 repealed 7-9H-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2005, ch. 104, § 11, relating to the short title of the act, effective January 1, 2016. For provisions of former section,seethe 2014 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
